summary: This document is an invoice from FedEx for shipping services provided to NYSO LLC, detailing charges and adjustments. It includes information about the shipment, sender, and payment due date.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is listed as the sender of a package shipped via FedEx.

persons.name: Alberto Pinto
persons.context: Alberto Pinto is also listed as a sender associated with the shipment.

connections.description: Both individuals are listed as senders for the same FedEx shipment.

events.title: FedEx Shipment Drop-off
events.description: A package was dropped off for shipment by Jeffrey Epstein and Alberto Pinto.

locations: Hotel de la Victoire, 11 Rue de Aboukir, Paris 75002, France
keyFacts: The invoice is dated October 29, 2004, and pertains to a shipment made on October 26, 2004.
The total charges for the shipment were $20.70 after discounts.
The shipment was sent from New York to Paris.
Jeffrey Epstein and Alberto Pinto are both listed as senders on the invoice.
The invoice includes a fuel surcharge and details about the shipment type.
